Package gw.api.print

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ListViewCustomPrintAction
    Variation of the the PrintActionListener which pops up print options for printing a ListView embedded in a panel on the present Location's Screen. Users can choose from several print options on this popup:

    - print to PDF - output to CSV - output to CSV which selected columns (user selectable in this popup)

    once the selection is made, the print processing is triggered.

    The process of printing a list view with various different output options is done in two steps, each accomplished with a different but related List View print action. These are:

    - ListViewPrintOptionPopupAction: prepares for printing by priming the popup dialog box which asks the user for print instructions. This action is responsible for examining the List View in question to find what columns are avaiable to print. It is also responsible for activation of the popup.

    - ListViewCustomPrintAction: action triggered when a user clicks the "OK" button, which signifies that the user has made his/her choices and wishes to print. This action is responsible for examining the choices made by the user, then performing the actual print.
    ListViewPrintAction
    Print Action that prints a specified list view.
    ListViewPrintOptionPopupAction
    Variation of the the PrintAction which pops up print options for printing a ListView embedded in a panel on the present Location's Screen. Users can choose from several print options on this popup:

    - print to PDF - output to CSV - output to CSV which selected columns (user selectable in this popup)

    once the selection is made, the print processing is triggered.

    The process of printing a list view with various different output options is done in two steps, each accomplished with a different but related List View print action. These are:

    - ListViewPrintOptionPopupAction: prepares for printing by priming the popup dialog box which asks the user for print instructions. This action is responsible for examining the List View in question to find what columns are avaiable to print. It is also responsible for activation of the popup.

    - ListViewCustomPrintAction: action triggered when a user clicks the "OK" button, which signifies that the user has made his/her choices and wishes to print. This action is responsible for examining the choices made by the user, then performing the actual print.
    ListViewPrintOptions
    Data container class used to transit data between the Print List View Options popup to the ListViewPrintOptionPopupAction, which uses this information to determine how the user wants data output.
    ListViewPrintOptions.ColumnHeaderInfo  
    PdfGeneratorInputTooLargeException  
    PrintAction
    Basis of print output functionality within the Pebbles infrastructure.
    PrintException  
    PrintLocationAction
    Outputs a given location to PDF.
    PrintSettings  
    PrintSettings.InternalPrintSettings  
    PrintUserTreeNode  
    PrintUtil
    Helper for Printing, contains thread local variables that indicate whether we are printing to a CSV or PDF file.
    PrintWidgetAction
    Print Action for output of a single individual widget on a Page.
    PrintWidgetAction.PrintWidgetSearchCriteria  
    WidgetPrintException
